verses.verse: וּֽלְנָעֳמִ֞י <WH5281> And Naomi [מְיֻדָּע כ] (מֹודַ֣ע <WH3045> acknowledge ק) לְאִישָׁ֗הּ <WH376> of her husband's אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> man גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> a mighty חַ֔יִל <WH2428> of wealth מִמִּשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> of the family אֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH458> of Elimelech וּשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> and his name בֹּֽעַז׃ <WH1162> [was] Boaz

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said ר֨וּת <WH7327> And Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֜ה <WH4125> the Moabitess אֶֽל־ <WH413> to נָעֳמִ֗י <WH5281> unto Naomi אֵֽלְכָה־ <WH1980> go נָּ֤א <WH4994> Please הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> to the field וַאֲלַקֳטָ֣ה <WH3950> and glean בַשִּׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> ears of corn אַחַ֕ר <WH310> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> I shall find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> [him] in whose sight וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And she said לָ֖הּ לְכִ֥י <WH1980> to her Go בִתִּֽי׃ <WH1323> my daughter

וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> departed וַתָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> and came וַתְּלַקֵּ֣ט <WH3950> and gleaned בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after הַקֹּצְרִ֑ים <WH7114> the reapers וַיִּ֣קֶר <WH7136> was to light מִקְרֶ֔הָ <WH4745> and her hap חֶלְקַ֤ת <WH2513> on a part הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of the field לְבֹ֔עַז <WH1162> [belonging] unto Boaz אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who מִמִּשְׁפַּ֥חַת <WH4940> who [was] of the kindred אֱלִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH458> of Elimelech

וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> now behold בֹ֗עַז <WH1162> And behold Boaz בָּ֚א <WH935> came מִבֵּ֣ית לֶ֔חֶם <WH1035> from Bethlehem וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said לַקּוֹצְרִ֖ים <WH7114> unto the reapers יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> and they וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <WH559> [be] with you And they answered ל֖וֹ יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <WH1288> bless יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> him The LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said בֹּ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> Boaz לְנַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> unto his servant הַנִּצָּ֖ב <WH5324> that was set עַל־ <WH5921> of הַקּֽוֹצְרִ֑ים <WH7114> over the reapers לְמִ֖י <WH4310> Whose הַנַּעֲרָ֥ה <WH5291> Whose damsel הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיַּ֗עַן <WH6030> answered הַנַּ֛עַר <WH5288> And the servant הַנִּצָּ֥ב <WH5324> that was set עַל־ <WH5921> of הַקּוֹצְרִ֖ים <WH7114> over the reapers וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said נַעֲרָ֤ה <WH5291> damsel מֽוֹאֲבִיָּה֙ <WH4125> It [is] the Moabitish הִ֔יא <WH1931> who הַשָּׁ֥בָה <WH7725> that came back עִֽם־ <WH5973> with נָעֳמִ֖י <WH5281> with Naomi מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> out of the country מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And she said אֲלַקֳטָה־ <WH3950> I pray you let me glean נָּא֙ <WH4994> Please וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <WH622> and gather בָֽעֳמָרִ֔ים <WH6016> among the sheaves אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after הַקּוֹצְרִ֑ים <WH7114> the reapers וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> so she came וַֽתַּעֲמ֗וֹד <WH5975> and hath continued מֵאָ֤ז <WH227> even הַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> from the morning וְעַד־ <WH5704> until עַ֔תָּה <WH6258> now זֶ֛ה <WH2088> she שִׁבְתָּ֥הּ <WH3427> until now that she tarried הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> in the house מְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> a little

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> Then said בֹּ֨עַז <WH1162> Boaz אֶל־ <WH413> to ר֜וּת <WH7327> unto Ruth הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> carefully שָׁמַ֣עַתְּ <WH8085> Hearest בִּתִּ֗י <WH1323> my daughter אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּלְכִי֙ <WH1980> go לִלְקֹט֙ <WH3950> not to glean בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> field אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> in another וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> furthermore לֹ֥א <WH3808> carefully תַעֲבוּרִ֖י <WH5674> neither go מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְכֹ֥ה <WH3541> here תִדְבָּקִ֖ין <WH1692> from hence but abide עִם־ <WH5973> with נַעֲרֹתָֽי׃ <WH5291> here fast by my maidens

עֵינַ֜יִךְ <WH5869> [Let] thine eyes בַּשָּׂדֶ֤ה <WH7704> [be] on the field אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִקְצֹרוּן֙ <WH7114> that they do reap וְהָלַ֣כְתְּ <WH1980> and go אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ן <WH310> thou after הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> Indeed צִוִּ֛יתִי <WH6680> them have I not charged אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> the young men לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> not נָגְעֵ֑ךְ <WH5060> that they shall not touch וְצָמִ֗ת <WH6770> thee? and when thou art athirst וְהָלַכְתְּ֙ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> about הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> unto the vessels וְשָׁתִ֕ית <WH8354> and drink מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what יִשְׁאֲב֖וּן <WH7579> have drawn הַנְּעָרִֽים׃ <WH5288> of [that] which the young men

וַתִּפֹּל֙ <WH5307> Then she fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנֶ֔יהָ <WH6440> on her face וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> and bowed אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> herself to the ground וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> Why מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> unto him Why have I found חֵ֤ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> in thine eyes לְהַכִּירֵ֔נִי <WH5234> that thou shouldest take knowledge וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> alien

וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> answered בֹּ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> And Boaz וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לָ֔הּ הֻגֵּ֨ד <WH5046> unto her It hath fully הֻגַּ֜ד <WH5046> been shewed לִ֗י כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> to her All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you עָשִׂית֙ <WH6213> me all that thou hast done אֶת־ <WH854> for חֲמוֹתֵ֔ךְ <WH2545> unto thy mother in law אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> since מ֣וֹת <WH4194> the death אִישֵׁ֑ךְ <WH376> of thine husband וַתַּֽעַזְבִ֞י <WH5800> and [how] thou hast left אָבִ֣יךְ <WH1> thy father וְאִמֵּ֗ךְ <WH517> and thy mother וְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the land מֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֔ךְ <WH4138> of thy nativity וַתֵּ֣לְכִ֔י <WH1980> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to עַ֕ם <WH5971> unto a people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָדַ֖עַתְּ <WH3045> which thou knewest תְּמ֥וֹל <WH8543> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> before that time

יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> recompense יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD פָּעֳלֵ֑ךְ <WH6467> thy work וּתְהִ֨י <WH1961> become מַשְׂכֻּרְתֵּ֜ךְ <WH4909> reward שְׁלֵמָ֗ה <WH8003> and a full מֵעִ֤ם <WH5973> from יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> be given thee of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose בָּ֖את <WH935> thou art come לַחֲס֥וֹת <WH2620> to trust תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under כְּנָפָֽיו׃ <WH3671> under whose wings

וַ֠תֹּאמֶר <WH559> Then she said אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> Let me find חֵ֨ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֶ֤יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> my lord כִּ֣י <WH3588> and indeed נִֽחַמְתָּ֔נִי <WH5162> for that thou hast comforted וְכִ֥י <WH3588> and indeed דִבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> me and for that thou hast spoken עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵ֣ב <WH3820> friendly שִׁפְחָתֶ֑ךָ <WH8198> unto thine handmaid וְאָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> I am כְּאַחַ֖ת <WH259> though I be not like unto one שִׁפְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8198> of thine handmaidens

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said לָ֨ה בֹ֜עַז <WH1162> And Boaz לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> after הָאֹ֗כֶל <WH400> eating גֹּ֤שִֽׁי <WH5066> come הֲלֹם֙ <WH1988> thou hither וְאָכַ֣לְתְּ <WH398> and eat מִן־ <WH4480> at הַלֶּ֔חֶם <WH3899> of the bread וְטָבַ֥לְתְּ <WH2881> and dip פִּתֵּ֖ךְ <WH6595> thy morsel בַּחֹ֑מֶץ <WH2558> in the vinegar וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> And she sat מִצַּ֣ד <WH6654> beside הַקּֽוֹצְרִ֔ים <WH7114> the reapers וַיִּצְבָּט־ <WH6642> and he reached לָ֣הּ קָלִ֔י <WH7039> her parched וַתֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> [corn] and she did eat וַתִּשְׂבַּ֖ע <WH7646> and was sufficed וַתֹּתַֽר׃ <WH3498> and left

וַתָּ֖קָם <WH6965> And when she was risen up לְלַקֵּ֑ט <WH3950> to glean וַיְצַו֩ <WH6680> commanded בֹּ֨עַז <WH1162> Boaz אֶת־ <WH853> נְעָרָ֜יו <WH5288> his young men לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying גַּ֣ם <WH1571> even בֵּ֧ין <WH996> among הָֽעֳמָרִ֛ים <WH6016> even among the sheaves תְּלַקֵּ֖ט <WH3950> Let her glean וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תַכְלִימֽוּהָ׃ <WH3637> and reproach

וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> Also שֹׁל־ <WH7997> And let fall תָּשֹׁ֥לּוּ <WH7997> of purpose לָ֖הּ מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצְּבָתִ֑ים <WH6653> also [some] of the handfuls וַעֲזַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH5800> for her and leave וְלִקְּטָ֖ה <WH3950> [them] that she may glean וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִגְעֲרוּ־ <WH1605> [them] and rebuke בָֽהּ׃

וַתְּלַקֵּ֥ט <WH3950> So she gleaned בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> in the field עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> until even וַתַּחְבֹּט֙ <WH2251> and beat out אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what לִקֵּ֔טָה <WH3950> that she had gleaned וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become כְּאֵיפָ֥ה <WH374> and it was about an ephah שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <WH8184> of barley

וַתִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> And she took [it] up וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> and went הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> into the city וַתֵּ֥רֶא <WH7200> saw חֲמוֹתָ֖הּ <WH2545> and her mother in law אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what לִקֵּ֑טָה <WH3950> what she had gleaned וַתּוֹצֵא֙ <WH3318> and she brought forth וַתִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and gave לָ֔הּ אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what הוֹתִ֖רָה <WH3498> to her that she had reserved מִשָּׂבְעָֽהּ׃ <WH7648> after she was sufficed

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said לָ֨הּ חֲמוֹתָ֜הּ <WH2545> And her mother in law אֵיפֹ֨ה <WH375> to her Where לִקַּ֤טְתְּ <WH3950> unto her Where hast thou gleaned הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> to day וְאָ֣נָה <WH575> and where עָשִׂ֔ית <WH6213> wroughtest יְהִ֥י <WH1961> become מַכִּירֵ֖ךְ <WH5234> be he that did take knowledge בָּר֑וּךְ <WH1288> thou? blessed וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> of thee And she shewed לַחֲמוֹתָ֗הּ <WH2545> her mother in law אֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom עָשְׂתָה֙ <WH6213> with whom she had wrought עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> name הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> The man's אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom עָשִׂ֧יתִי <WH6213> with whom I wrought עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> with הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> today בֹּֽעַז׃ <WH1162> [is] Boaz

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said נָעֳמִ֜י <WH5281> And Naomi לְכַלָּתָ֗הּ <WH3618> unto her daughter in law בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed הוּא֙ <WH1931> he לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [be] he of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> has not עָזַ֣ב <WH5800> who hath not left off חַסְדּ֔וֹ <WH2617> his kindness אֶת־ <WH854> for הַחַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> to the living וְאֶת־ <WH854> and to הַמֵּתִ֑ים <WH4191> and to the dead וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said לָ֣הּ נָעֳמִ֗י <WH5281> And Naomi קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> [is] near of kin לָ֙נוּ֙ הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> unto her The man מִֽגֹּאֲלֵ֖נוּ <WH1350> unto us one of our next kinsmen הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said ר֣וּת <WH7327> And Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֑ה <WH4125> the Moabitess גַּ֣ם ׀ <WH1571> Furthermore כִּי־ <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> He said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about עִם־ <WH5973> with הַנְּעָרִ֤ים <WH5288> by my young men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לִי֙ תִּדְבָּקִ֔ין <WH1692> unto me also Thou shalt keep fast עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אִם־ <WH518> lo כִּלּ֔וּ <WH3615> until they have ended אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקָּצִ֖יר <WH7105> all my harvest אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לִֽי׃

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said נָעֳמִ֖י <WH5281> And Naomi אֶל־ <WH413> to ר֣וּת <WH7327> unto Ruth כַּלָּתָ֑הּ <WH3618> her daughter in law ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [It is] good בִּתִּ֗י <WH1323> my daughter כִּ֤י <WH3588> that תֵֽצְאִי֙ <WH3318> that thou go out עִם־ <WH5973> with נַ֣עֲרוֹתָ֔יו <WH5291> with his maidens וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> so יִפְגְּעוּ־ <WH6293> that they meet בָ֖ךְ בְּשָׂדֶ֥ה <WH7704> field אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> thee not in any other

וַתִּדְבַּ֞ק <WH1692> So she kept fast בְּנַעֲר֥וֹת <WH5291> by the maidens בֹּ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> of Boaz לְלַקֵּ֔ט <WH3950> to glean עַד־ <WH5704> until כְּל֥וֹת <WH3615> unto the end קְצִֽיר־ <WH7105> harvest הַשְּׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8184> of barley וּקְצִ֣יר <WH7105> harvest הַֽחִטִּ֑ים <WH2406> and of wheat וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt אֶת־ <WH854> with חֲמוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH2545> with her mother in law
